title: INTRODUCTION TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section establishes the terms governing the use of Apple's services and content.

title: USING OUR SERVICES PAYMENTS, TAXES AND REFUNDS
Purpose: This section outlines the payment process, refund policies, and transactional agreements for acquiring content.

title: ACCOUNT
Purpose: This section details the requirements and responsibilities related to creating and maintaining an Apple ID.

title: PRIVACY
Purpose: This section refers to Apple's Privacy Policy affecting the use of its services.

title: SERVICES AND CONTENT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section provides rules for the proper use of Apple services and content to ensure compliance.

title: DOWNLOADS
Purpose: This section explains limitations on downloading content and conditions for redownloading.

title: SUBSCRIPTIONS
Purpose: This section covers details regarding subscription services, including pricing and renewal.

title: CONTENT AND SERVICE AVAILABILITY
Purpose: This section addresses geographical availability of services and content.

title: THIRD-PARTY DEVICES AND EQUIPMENT
Purpose: This section notes potential limitations in service when using non-Apple devices.

title: YOUR SUBMISSIONS TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section covers the rules and guidelines for user submissions on Apple's platforms.

title: FAMILY SHARING
Purpose: This section explains how Family Sharing works and the conditions regarding shared purchases.

title: SERIES PASS AND MULTI-PASS
Purpose: This section describes the purchasing options for television content as it becomes available.

title: ADDITIONAL APP STORE TERMS (EXCLUDING APPLE ARCADE APPS)
Purpose: This section provides additional terms specific to App Store content, including licenses.

title: APP MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
Purpose: This section clarifies responsibilities regarding the maintenance of Apple and third-party apps.

title: APP BUNDLES
Purpose: This section details the purchasing process for apps sold together as bundled packages.

title: SEARCH RESULTS AND RANKINGS
Purpose: This section outlines how apps are ranked and ordered in search results within the App Store.

title: LICENSED APPLICATION END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT
Purpose: This section specifies the licensing terms for applications made available through the App Store.

title: CONSENT TO USE OF DATA
Purpose: This section details how user data may be collected and used by Apple.

title: TERMINATION
Purpose: This section explains conditions under which the end user license agreement may be terminated.

title: EXTERNAL SERVICES
Purpose: This section provides guidelines regarding access to third-party services via licensed applications.

title: WARRANTY
Purpose: This section discusses the extent of warranties related to licensed applications and external services.

title: LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
Purpose: This section sets limitations on Apple's liability for damages related to the use of services.

title: U.S. Government End Users
Purpose: This section clarifies applicable terms for U.S. government end users.

title: ADDITIONAL TERMS FOR CONTENT ACQUIRED FROM THIRD PARTIES
Purpose: This section delineates terms associated with content acquired from third-party providers.

title: ADDITIONAL APPLE MUSIC TERMS
Purpose: This section provides specific terms related to the use of Apple Music and iCloud Music Library.

title: ADDITIONAL APPLE FITNESS+ TERMS
Purpose: This section discusses the purpose and limitations of the Apple Fitness+ service.

title: CARRIER MEMBERSHIP
Purpose: This section describes membership services offered through wireless carriers and their governance.

title: MISCELLANEOUS TERMS APPLICABLE TO ALL SERVICES
Purpose: This section includes various overarching terms applicable across all services.

title: CONTRACT CHANGES
Purpose: This section describes how Apple may modify the agreement and the process for notifying users.

title: THIRD-PARTY MATERIALS
Purpose: This section disclaims Apple’s responsibility for third-party content linked within their services.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Purpose: This section affirms Apple’s ownership of proprietary materials and restricts their unauthorized use.

title: COPYRIGHT
Purpose: This section outlines copyright ownership and intellectual property rights related to Apple’s content.

title: TERMINATION AND SUSPENSION OF SERVICES
Purpose: This section explains the conditions under which Apple may terminate services to users.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
Purpose: This section outlines the limitations of liability and disclaimers regarding service warranties.

title: Liability Limitation
Purpose: This section outlines the circumstances under which Apple may be held liable for damages or losses related to the use of its services.

title: Protection of Information
Purpose: Apple commits to using reasonable efforts to protect user information submitted in connection with its services.

title: Statutory Exceptions for Public Institutions
Purpose: This section clarifies that certain parts of the agreement may be deemed invalid for public institutions due to applicable laws.

title: Governing Law
Purpose: This section specifies the governing law and jurisdiction for disputes arising from the agreement.

title: Other Provisions
Purpose: This section contains miscellaneous provisions regarding the relationship between the user and Apple, including enforcement and compliance with laws.
